creditline: The Fred R. Salisbury II Fund
description: elaborately engraved, tapering straight side pitched with applied hollow ribbed extruded handle; almost covered with engraved flowers, leaves and lettering; possibly sandwich.
markings: \'Presented to/Mr & Mrs Coombs/on their Wedding Day/March 13 1886\', beneath spout; \'Possibly sandwich $475°° check 8D6880\', on sticker, on bottom
title: Pitcher
